title: SketchPad
tag: A site that brings the classic Etch A Sketch experience to the digital world.
description: A browser-based drawing application that blends the fun of a traditional Etch-A-Sketch with digital creativity. This project was inspired by my interest in art and drawing, and it served as a great learning experience in core web development concepts. Users can draw on a virtual canvas, experiment with different colors, and reset the canvas to start fresh.
